name: Elementor
description:
My first game! Was made over a weekend during game makers toolkit's game jam.

 A platformer where the platforms are both your enemies and the only way to survive.

You have to keep track of what elements are strong against each other while trying to avoid falling to your death.

If the score in the top left is cut off just change the resolution and it should get fixed.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You start out as neutral and gain the first element you touch.

Strong vs weak = Gain 5 seconds triple jump and makes the platform neutral.

Weak vs strong = Death.

Secondary element reactions = Turns both you and the platform neutral.

                                                                                Water

                                                                     ↗              |              ↘

Elemental chart:            Thunder    ------- | ------        Fire

                                                                    ↖               |             ↙

                                                                               Earth

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump (you have double jump from the start)

P = Pause

Try to stay near the top since overlapping platforms have some weirdness.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I didn't have time to polish much but have fun!
